channel.title: Core on Spike
channel.description: Recent content in Core on Spike

item.title: Core
item.description: This module contains some of the core functions of Spike. $remindme $remindme [HH:MM:SS] [text] Sends a reminder message to the same channel in the given time. $embedify $embedify [title] ; [content] Creates a message embed with the given title and content. $echo $echo [text] Sends a message as Spike. To use this command, you need to purchase access in the Spike Store. $clear $clear [2 <= x <= 100] Deletes the last x messages from the channel, including the command invocation.
